entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
